subject_terms_3: Photography Women Ethnic costumes Business enterprises
physical_appearance: "The image displays three picture postcards. All of them are rectangular in shape. Each postcard contains an image of a woman. She is dressed in her ethnic costume, with stalks of a red flower as her headdress. The postcard on the left shows her holding a kris. The postcard in the middle depicts her holding a bow and an arrow. The postcard in on the right shows her in a bending sideways at the hips in a pose. All three postcards have the words ""Java-China-Japan Lijn"" stated at the bottom."
title_text: Three Postcards entitled “Java-China-Japan Lijn"" Set of Postcards “Java-China-Japan” (x3)
